mapper.select: select pair_key AS "key", pair_value AS "value" from h_dict_pairs where dict_name= #{dn}

select a.app AS "app", a.dict_name AS "dictName", a.dict_desc AS "dictDesc", a.dict_source AS "dictSource", a.key_column AS "keyColumn", a.val_column AS "valColumn", count(b.pair_key) AS "dictNum" from h_dict_base a left join h_dict_pairs b on a.dict_name = b.dict_name where a.dict_source = 1 group by a.app, a.dict_name, a.dict_desc, a.dict_source, a.key_column, a.val_column

select a.app AS "app", a.dict_name AS "dictName", a.dict_desc AS "dictDesc", a.dict_source AS "dictSource", a.key_column AS "keyColumn", a.val_column AS "valColumn", b.sql_content AS "sqlContent" from h_dict_base a left join h_dict_sql b on a.dict_name = b.dict_name where a.dict_source = 2
select a.app AS "app", b.dict_name AS "dn", b.pair_key AS "key", b.pair_value AS "value" from h_dict_base a, h_dict_pairs b where a.dict_name = b.dict_name order by b.dict_name, b.pair_key
